lead_paragraph: South Africa fast bowler Dale Steyn will miss the second test against England, which starts at Newlands on Saturday, after failing to recover from a shoulder injury, captain Hashim Amla said.

headline.print_headline: Rabada to Replace Injured Steyn for South Africa
headline.main: Rabada to Replace Injured Steyn for South Africa

snippet: South Africa fast bowler Dale Steyn will miss the second test against England, which starts at Newlands on Saturday, after failing to recover from a shoulder injury, captain Hashim Amla said....
